title: AFS: Sanction Failure: Economic Growth, Defense Expenditures, and the Islamic Republic of Iran
description: Chad Kunsman, Editorial Assistant at Armed Forces & Society, interviews author Bruce McDonald III about his recent article, "Sanction Failure: Economic Growth, Defense Expenditures, and the Islamic Republic of Iran," co-authored by Vincent Reitano. Publication date: August 25, 2016
content:encoded: Chad Kunsman, Editorial Assistant at Armed Forces & Society, interviews author Bruce McDonald III about his recent article, "Sanction Failure: Economic Growth, Defense Expenditures, and the Islamic Republic of Iran," co-authored by Vincent Reitano. Publication date: August 25, 2016
